basics.summary: Currently an Engineering Student @ Virginia Tech - Designing Circuits, Making Music, Creating Content

education.area: B.S. in Computuer Engineering, Minor in Music Technologies

portfolio.name: Home Audio Amplifier with Graphic Equalizer
portfolio.description: Lead team of 2 to comprehensively design, prototype, and build a graphic equalizer with a live spectrogram display and power efficient amplifier using Pulse Width Modulation.

portfolio.name: Pixel Monarch Embedded Systems
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented a microcontroller game on an MSP432 using eUSCI_A0 UART and eUSCI_B2 SPI-driven LCD; supported two presets with a variable territory grid (3×3 or 5×5) for flexible gameplay modes.

portfolio.name: Touhou Embedded Systems
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented a real-time bullet hell game on an MSP432 microcontroller using Timer32 software timers to drive a selectable framerate (15 / 30 / 60 FPS), ensuring frame independent movement by scaling all object motion with measured deltaTime.

portfolio.name: Cookie Clicker Embedded Systems
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented a microcontroller-based idle game on an MSP432 using SPI-driven LCD and ADC-read joystick; implemented non blocking architecture with interrupt-driven sleep/wake so the MCU executes one main loop per wakeup, minimizing active runtime.

portfolio.name: Vertical Aesthetic Wind Turbine
portfolio.description: Designed a portable VAWT to deliver renewable on trail charging for backpackers—prioritizing safety, minimal environmental impact, and emergency device reliability for users and regional stewards.

portfolio.name: Website Project Manager
portfolio.description: Managed a team of 20 students to create an application to allow upcoming IT program students to visualize the classes paths with eligibility through prerequisites.

portfolio.name: Music and Wave Physics Undergraduate Research
portfolio.description: Researched and modeled resonance equations in MATLAB to pick the perfect dimensions and attributes for the resonance box and string system, furthering design decisions for a sonometer project used to visually and audibly demonstrate physics concepts to grade-school students.

portfolio.name: Analog Guitar Amplifier
portfolio.description: Researched the use of Op-amps, diodes, transistors in the application of building a guitar amp. Designed circuit schematics and ran simulations in LTspice. Tests with analog testing equipment on a breadboard resulted in a working amplifier.
